text: I never really knew what to study or what i would do for a living. I am, at first, a person who likes art a lot. Since i was young i used to draw and paint and i still enjoy it a lot. I was sometime influenced by the things i was studying in highscool. Sometimes i wanted to pursue an English licence, sometime i was more interested into a History and geopolitical licence. But last year, when i had to make a choice, i decided to go in a graphic DN MADE ,wich is a graphic themed licence that give you the tools and the knowledges to be a graphic desinger. I thought i would enjoy myself and would be drawind a lot in this licence but i did not and was a bit dissapointed. So i decided to stop and to choose another path for this year. So i was again hesitating about the studies i had to choose. I thinked again about going into English or History. But these studies close a lot of options and really focus into one and only subject, and i was still not sure about what i wanted to do growing up. But i knew someone who did this licence and told me that it was very general and that was not reducing option. Also i started to look for this licence and it seemed very interesting to me. The study of the process of communication and the medias interested me. I am also interested by the work of journalism and this licence can lead to it.
